dc_description_s: This line shapefile contains commune boundaries for Burkina Faso as of January 2007. These are the level 3 administrative units (ADM3) for Burkina Faso. This layer is part of the Map Library dataset containing line and polygon boundaries for individual countries on the African continent. The Map Library is a project of the UK charity â€œThe Map Maker Trust." It aims to make public domain mapping data more readily available for development in all kinds of fields, from health care to urban management, from de-mining to environmental protection. Map Maker Ltd. (2007). Commune Boundaries, Burkina Faso, 2007 Map Maker, Ltd. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/zz264tb0165.
